page.title: 15 Farm Work at Trevathan
page.content: The work at the farm is done by the farmer and his oldest son who {recently}left school.Most days start with a walk around the farm{checking, feeding and giving the animals water. During the course of the day they go into each field to check for any {disease}that is damaging the crops. Then they go about maintaining the farm.One of the two house cows is in calf so their other cow is{hand-milked .Work is finished at any time in the evening and starts at 7 to 8.00am.In autumn the fields are ploughed. They then prepare the ground and drill it. Spraying and{fertilizing}comes later. All the machines are housed to save them from rusting.When needed the hedges are{rebuilt,}new gates are fitted and ditches are cleaned out to help fields drain properly.
